title: 1 bed 1 bath in E. Lakeview (New Yorker Building)
posting_body: Beautiful (and rare) 1 bed 1 bath 17th floor condo in the New Yorker in Lakeview East!
Lease would be from September-April with the option to renew.
*Amenities building (FFC gym in building, Market and Deli, great door/security staff, Laundry and Party Rooms, Roof Deck with grills, package room with dry cleaning, etc.)
I am sad to have to leave.
Would also be willing to leave some furniture if needed (couch, coffee table, bed frame, end tables, tv stand)
Rent includes RCN cable package, internet, Water and Trash.
You only pay electric through ComEd.
Would be needed to apply through property management company for Relet or renewal.
Pet friendly building but must be approved via management company.
Please reach out with any questions!
